name: Facebook (red)
description: My first style which gives Facebook a red look.
additional_info:
Change Log 12/02/2014 (2.0) - More Buttons; more fixes 11/02/2014 (1.9) - Changed some buttons; more improvements and fixes 10/02/2014 (1.8) - Update for Facebook help page (http://facebook.com/help/) 09/02/2014 (1.7) - Update for homepage of Facebook; now you can find version in first line of code 08/02/2014 (1.6) - Some improvements 07/02/2014 (1.5) - Changed font of textboxes; updated chat-style 06/02/2014 (1.4) - New (background-)colors for some dropdown-menus 05/02/2014 (1.3) - Removed auto-resize; changed chat-colors 04/02/2014 (1.2) - Added auto-resize search field 03/02/2014 (1.1.1) - Fixed litte bug on notifications 02/02/2014 (1.1) - Fixed chat-tab-border-color (gray); changed colors; changed style of app-notifications
01/02/2014 (1.0) - First release
